name: Well
description: A stone-lined water source, representing depth, hidden resources, and the source of life and wisdom.

person: Someone who provides essential resources or deep wisdom to others
A person who hoards resources or keeps important information hidden
creatureTrap: Creatures that live in or guard water sources
Hidden depths or underwater hazards that pose drowning risks
place: Sources of clean water, healing springs, or places of spiritual renewal
Polluted or cursed water sources that bring sickness or misfortune
treasure: Items that provide sustenance or have been preserved in deep waters
Treasures that are difficult to retrieve or come with water-related curses
situation: Discovering deep resources or wisdom that sustains through difficult times
Running dry of essential resources or finding that trusted sources are contaminated
